ComicInfo.Summary:
Deadlock Part 11: Deadlock and the Bad Seeds take on an army of Terminators and the serial killer, The Accountant.
Rain Dogs Part 10: Brother Vernon, Holly, and Eve have their final confrontation on the top on the World Trade Center.
Scene of the Crime: Sinister and Dexter try to deliver an invitation to a party to Jeffy Huang and all seems to go wrong.
Sector House Part 8: Judge Rico survives shoot-out but remains a pariah with his fellow judges in Tac Group 9. The leak in the group is also discovered.
ComicInfo.Tags: Deadlock,Eve,Finnigan Sinister,Holly,Judge Dredd,Judge Rico,Judges of Mega-City One,Mega-City One,Ramone Dexter,Rico Dredd,Sinister Dexter
ComicInfo.Title: Deadlock Part 11; Rain Dogs Part 10; Scene of the Crime; Sector House Part 8
